posts.title: Ultimate Party Travel Guide
posts.content: Life is too short to spend sober – that’s why the Ultimate Party Travel Guide is here to show you the best party spots on the planet. From pub crawls to beach parties, the guide shows you over 100 of the world’s best places to get completely wasted.

posts.title: 3-In-1 Breakfast Station
posts.content: Enjoy a hearty diner-styled breakfast from the comfort of your very own kitchen using this 3 in-1 breakfast station. It comes with a built in coffee pot, oven, and a non-stick griddle so you can make all your favorites like eggs, bacon, sausage, and toast.

posts.title: Mechanical Combination Lock USB Drive
posts.content: Protect your data from prying eyes by storing it in the mechanical combination lock USB drive. Engineered in accordance from sketches by Leonardo da Vinci, your information remains guarded by a 5 digit combination lock that’s nearly impossible to crack.

posts.title: Leather Book iPad Case
posts.content: Protect your prized tablet in 18th century style by encasing it in this leather book iPad case. This elegant case – handmade from genuine leather – protects your delicate screen from scratches while deterring thieves by disguising it as a leather-bound book.

posts.title: Remote Control Flying Bionic Bird
posts.content: Experience what it’s like to soar like a bird by taking to the skies with this remote control flying bionic bird. Charging in just 12 minutes, it features an ultra-light indestructible foam body and is complemented by a carbon fiber tail and wings.

posts.title: Sweet Heat Spicy Skittles
posts.content: Give your taste buds a kick during snack time by digging into these Sweet Heat spicy Skittles. These chewy bite size treats feature all new fruity flavors with a spicy kick like lemon spark, fiery watermelon, flamin’ orange, sizzlin’ strawberry, and blazin’ mango.

posts.title: Inflatable Bubble Tent
posts.content: Enjoy mother nature’s beauty without having to endure any uncomfortable weather conditions by staying inside this inflatable bubble tent. They’re crafted from fire-retardant PVC tarpaulin and feature enough interior room to accommodate a full sized air mattress.

posts.title: Endless Energy Gummy Supplements
posts.content: Get a fast-acting energy boost without the fatal crash of sugary energy drinks by popping a few of these Endless Energy gummy supplements. They feature a delightful lemony taste and are made with the L-theanine amino acid that helps you stay alert and focused.

posts.title: Bathtub Planetarium
posts.content: Transport yourself to a placid world where stress melts away when you activate this planetarium light in your bathtub. Simply place it at the side of the tub and watch in amazement as it projects dozens of beautiful stars onto your walls.

posts.title: Wearable Sled Legs
posts.content: Experience your favorite downhill runs like never before by hitting the slopes wearing these sled legs. After strapping them onto your legs, simply take a few running steps and slide down for a one of a kind thrill ride down your favorite hill.

posts.title: Idiot Proof iPhone Case
posts.content: Let’s face it – you’re an idiot. Luckily with the idiot proof iPhone case your phone won’t have to suffer on behalf of your incompetence. This rugged case encapsulates your phone in a tough waterproof exterior that protects it while still allowing you to easily access its features.

posts.title: Buddha Board Water Drawing Set
posts.content: Achieve inner peace by learning how to let go and live in the moment with the Buddha Board water drawing set. Simply fill the base with water, dip the bamboo brush, and begin drawing – as the water evaporates your masterpiece slowly fades away.
